MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:36pm. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault at Coulport Place substation and that repairs will be complex, so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:31 PM on Thursday, 24 December 2020.
